languages.text: "Не думаю, что ваше примитивное слово "правосудие" может нести в себе все смыслы, оттенки и значения того, что мы чувствуем, глядя на страдания Монолита душ, мон-кай".

traits.locale_text: "Не думаю, что ваше примитивное слово "правосудие" может нести в себе все смыслы, оттенки и значения того, что мы чувствуем, глядя на страдания Камня Душ, мон-кай".
traits.speaker: CrownWorldHarlequinLeader

languages.text: "I doubt if your primitive notion of 'justice' can convey the nuances of what our souls demand when we behold the torment of the Spirit Monolith, mon-keigh."
languages.original_text: "Не думаю, что ваше примитивное слово "правосудие" может нести в себе все смыслы, оттенки и значения того, что мы чувствуем, глядя на страдания Монолита душ, мон-кай".

traits.locale_text: "I doubt that your primitive notion of 'justice' can convey the nuances of what our souls demand when we behold the torment of the Spirit Monolith, mon-keigh."
traits.speaker: CrownWorldHarlequinLeader

traits.locale_text: "I doubt that your primitive notion of 'justice' can convey the nuances of what our souls demand when we behold the torment of the Spirit Monolith, mon-keigh."

traits.locale_text: "I doubt if your primitive notion of 'justice' can convey the nuances of what our souls demand when we behold the torment of the Spirit Monolith, mon-keigh."
traits.speaker: CrownWorldHarlequinLeader

languages.text: 「モン＝ケイ、スピリット・モノリスの苦痛を目にしながら君の猿知恵で考える『正義』に、僕らの魂が求めるもののニュアンスが含まれてるか怪しいもんだ」
languages.original_text: "I doubt if your primitive notion of 'justice' can convey the nuances of what our souls demand when we behold the torment of the Spirit Monolith, mon-keigh."

traits.locale_text: 「モン＝ケイ、スピリット・モノリスの苦痛を目にしながら君の猿知恵で考える『正義』に、僕らの魂が求めるもののニュアンスが含まれてるか怪しいもんだ」
traits.speaker: CrownWorldHarlequinLeader

languages.text: “你所说的‘正义’，以及我们的灵魂看到巨型灵魂石残骸时渴望的‘正义’，两者之间恐怕有些细微差别。不过，凭你们的原始头脑，恐怕无法理解，猴子。”
languages.original_text: "I doubt if your primitive notion of 'justice' can convey the nuances of what our souls demand when we behold the torment of the Spirit Monolith, mon-keigh."

traits.locale_text: “你所说的‘正义’，以及我们的灵魂看到巨型灵魂石残骸时渴望的‘正义’，两者之间恐怕有些细微差别。不过，凭你们的原始头脑，恐怕无法理解，猴子。”
traits.speaker: CrownWorldHarlequinLeader

languages.text: « Je doute que votre notion somme toute primitive de la justice puisse exprimer toutes les nuances des rétributions exigées par nos âmes pour les tourments infligés au Monolithe aux esprits, mon-keigh. »
languages.original_text: "I doubt if your primitive notion of 'justice' can convey the nuances of what our souls demand when we behold the torment of the Spirit Monolith, mon-keigh."

traits.locale_text: « Je doute que votre notion somme toute primitive de la justice puisse exprimer toutes les nuances des rétributions exigées par nos âmes pour les tourments infligés au Monolithe aux esprits, mon-keigh. »
traits.speaker: CrownWorldHarlequinLeader

languages.text: «Dudo que tu primitiva noción de la "justicia" pueda abarcar las sutilezas de lo que exigen nuestras almas al contemplar el tormento del Monolito Espiritual, mon-keigh».
languages.original_text: "I doubt if your primitive notion of 'justice' can convey the nuances of what our souls demand when we behold the torment of the Spirit Monolith, mon-keigh."

traits.locale_text: «Dudo que tu primitiva noción de la "justicia" pueda abarcar las sutilezas de lo que exigen nuestras almas al contemplar el tormento del Monolito Espiritual, mon-keigh».
traits.speaker: CrownWorldHarlequinLeader

languages.text: "Ich bezweifle, ob Eure primitive Vorstellung von 'Gerechtigkeit' die Nuancen dessen wiedergeben kann, was unsere Seelen verlangen, wenn wir die Qualen des Geistesmonoliths sehen, Chem-Pan-Sey."
languages.original_text: "I doubt if your primitive notion of 'justice' can convey the nuances of what our souls demand when we behold the torment of the Spirit Monolith, mon-keigh."

traits.locale_text: "Ich bezweifle, ob Eure primitive Vorstellung von 'Gerechtigkeit' die Nuancen dessen wiedergeben kann, was unsere Seelen verlangen, wenn wir die Qualen des Geistesmonoliths sehen, Chem-Pan-Sey."
traits.speaker: CrownWorldHarlequinLeader

languages.text: "İlkel 'adalet' anlayışınızın, Ruh Monoliti'nin çektiği ızdıraptan ötürü ruhlarımızın talep ettiği cezaya dair nüansları ifade edebileceğini sanmıyorum mon-keigh."
languages.original_text: "I doubt if your primitive notion of 'justice' can convey the nuances of what our souls demand when we behold the torment of the Spirit Monolith, mon-keigh."

traits.locale_text: "Ruh Monoliti'nin çektiği ızdırabı gördüğümüzde ruhumuzun talep ettiklerine kıyasla, ilkel 'adalet' anlayışınla gereken nüansları ifade edebileceğini sanmıyorum mon-keigh."
traits.speaker: CrownWorldHarlequinLeader
